articles.title: Huawei is still on the hook as Biden fine-tunes America’s strategy with China - South China Morning Post
articles.description: The US Innovation and Competition Act, which awaits passage in the House of Representatives before Biden signs it into law, dispels any illusion that the 46th American president would unwind the policies of his belligerent predecessor.

articles.title: G-7 leaders try to signal that page has turned on Trump era - Washington Post
articles.description: Rich democracies meeting in Britain sought to send a message Friday that they were back in business after a surge in vaccinations and the exit of a disruptive American president.
